participant_1.background:
I'm looking for a home in the country where I can enjoy my vintage cars and the peace and quiet of the winter season.
i have a lot of friends.
I enjoy watching sci-fi movies because they are often thought-provoking and inspire me to think about the future.
my brother is an archaeologist.
I enjoy spending time with my family, but I also enjoy my freedom to travel and see the world.

participant_2.background:
I am a clumsy person who likes to read pet training blogs and websites.
i like to skate.
My family is close-knit and we enjoy spending time together, especially on sunny days.
I spent more time with my wife and comics.
i worked as a clown in the circus.

content.text: It's a gorgeous day out today! I'm so excited to get outside and do some yard work!
I love days like these! I'll be spending it with my family.
I love spending time with my family too! What are you guys up to?
We're going to visit our aunt and uncle. They just got a new puppy!
Oh my goodness! I love puppies! Can I come with you?
Awesome! I can't wait to meet the puppy!
You're going to love him! He's so cute and playful.
We'll pick you up in an hour.
